name: Magnanakaw ng Libingan
description:
Zelda-clone submitted for a subject using Construct 2.
NOTE: Could not export as an html due to the fact that the game project contains more than 100 events and requires me to buy Construct 2 which I cannot possibly afford. 

Uploaded two capx files inside the rar file. One for the Menu and one for the game itself, think of it as disc 1 and 2.
